analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#808-827) is declared view but contains assembly code

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#254-258) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#256-258)

TemplateCrowdsale.init (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#1189-1214) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MainToken(token).mint(addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#1205-1207)
	-MainToken(token).mintAndFreeze(addresses[i],amounts[i],freezes[i]) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#1208-1212)

TemplateCrowdsale.init has external calls inside a loop:
	- MainToken(token).mint(addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#1205-1207)

TemplateCrowdsale.init has external calls inside a loop:
	- MainToken(token).mintAndFreeze(addresses[i],amounts[i],freezes[i]) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#1208-1212)

Reentrancy in TemplateCrowdsale.init (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#1189-1214):
	External calls:
	- MainToken(token).pause() (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#1195-1196)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- owner (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#1212-1213)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#397-406) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#401-404)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#414-425) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#425)

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#762-782) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#766)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#786-808) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#796-807)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#827-849) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_until > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd23e83c9de824ea5b58370da80505886ab3fda55.sol#829-830)
